Text.Page:
You're federation? Will you help the mandrakes? Will you help the fey?

Can you speak to Pedicel?

Can you save Seeliewood?

Are you brave? Are you strong?

Didn't the goddess Isren task the fey with protecting nature against corruption?

Where are our federation allies when the fey need help?

Will you take this scroll and join the fight in Seeliewood?
Have you ever seen such a beautiful place? Don't you want to help preserve it?
